message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to accept $10000.  I'm willing to come down to $11000, meeting you halfway. This reflects the value of the product to both of us. Let's try to find common ground.
